General.Name: ASBISc Enterprises PLC
General.Description: ASBISc Enterprises Plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the distribution of Information technology products. The company offers IT components, blocks and peripherals, and mobile IT systems. It also provides enterprise management, collaboration, cybersecurity, data centers, high performance computing, point of sales, software defined infrastructure, storage, and robotics solutions. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Limassol, Cyprus.

2.Name: Ms. Julia  Prihodko
2.Title: Chief Human Relations Officer & Exec. Director
